alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:40PM CDT until July 02 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 240 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Black Mesa Park, or 20 miles west of Boise City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Black Mesa Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
